trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway would like to add your personal touch to a new capitalistic enterprise.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the excitable Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to the excitable Loporrit.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_SEQ_03<tab>Report back to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the excitable Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the excitable Loporrit)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the excitable Loporrit)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the excitable Loporrit)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the excitable Loporrit)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the excitable Loporrit)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the excitable Loporrit)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the excitable Loporrit)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the excitable Loporrit)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_TODO_02<tab>Report back to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>Coiningway's dream of opening a shopping station has been realized, but its available products are still rather limited.

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>After considering what else we might offer, we have collectively decided that memorabilia inscribed with your signature would be a most desirable item. You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> the moon's leading celebrity, after all.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>Those personalized memorabilia you provided us proved more popular than we anticipated. We sold them all just as soon as we stocked them!
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_MANAGINGWAY_000_003<tab>Might you craft us some more? Needy Ways await.

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_MANAGINGWAY_000_004<tab>We will, of course, provide adequate compensation for your time, labor, and use of your likeness. One of our Ways eagerly awaits you in Greatest Endsvale whenever you wish to begin production.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_WORKINGSUPPORTER_000_005<tab><blip> Please state your request.

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_LOPORRIT04691_000_010<tab>Oooh! <var 29 EB02 /var>, welcome, welcome! You've come to make some memorabilia for us, yes? It's an honor to assist you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_LOPORRIT04691_000_011<tab>Anything you make is certain to sell like carrot cake, but our Ways would particularly love something with your name on it. And perhaps your face. Whatever you think is best!

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_LOPORRIT04691_000_012<tab>Anything you make is certain to sell like carrot cake, but our Ways would particularly love something with your name on it. And perhaps your face. Whatever you think is best!

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_LOPORRIT04691_000_013<tab>Anything you make is certain to sell like carrot cake, but our Ways would particularly love something with your name on it. And perhaps your face. Maybe even edible? I'll leave it to your discretion!

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_LOPORRIT04691_000_014<tab>I've stocked this doing supporter with all sorts of materials, so don't worry about running out of supplies. Oh, I can't wait to see what you come up with!
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_WORKINGSUPPORTER_100_020<tab><blip> This supporter detects sufficient supplies in your inventory. Please believe in yourself and enjoy crafting!
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_WORKINGSUPPORTER_100_021<tab><blip> This supporter detects sufficient supplies in your inventory. Please believe in yourself and enjoy crafting!
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_WORKINGSUPPORTER_100_022<tab><blip> This supporter detects sufficient supplies in your inventory. Please believe in yourself and enjoy crafting!
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_WORKINGSUPPORTER_100_023<tab>Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Distributing helpful supplies now.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_WORKINGSUPPORTER_100_024<tab>Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Distributing helpful supplies now.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_WORKINGSUPPORTER_100_025<tab>Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Distributing helpful supplies now.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_LOPORRIT04691_000_030<tab>Are you finished? Can I see?

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_LOPORRIT04691_000_031<tab>Oh, how lovely! An item worthy of <var 29 EB02 /var>'s name. I'll go and stock these in the shopping station straightaway─the others will riot when they see! Perhaps literally, now that I think about it. Oh dear... Er, Managingway should have your compensation waiting for you.

TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_MANAGINGWAY_000_040<tab>Thank you for your cooperation, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. For all the help and hope you've given us, I am sure those mementos will be our shopping station's best seller.
TEXT_BANLOP105_04691_MANAGINGWAY_000_041<tab>Speaking of which, I must secure one for myself... Er, strictly for managerial purposes! Ahem.
